about_the_game:
This is the full art book (PDF) for the game Telestians. 200+ Pages

It includes ALL the uncensored Heroes, Advisors, Great Armies, Monsters, Merchants, Ruin locations, Temple locations, and Victory & Defeat screens.

The artwork of the world of Telestians. Explore the fantasy world of Telestia, where many races live, prosper and war. See the heroes of the Barbarians, Chaos Horde, Dwarves, Elves, Gadiantons, Knights, Orcs, Reptilians and Undead. Complete with environmental art, and all the roaming monsters, Telestians is perfect to bring out your creativity and get lost in an fantastical world of intrigue.
detailed_description:
This is the full art book (PDF) for the game Telestians. 200+ Pages

It includes ALL the uncensored Heroes, Advisors, Great Armies, Monsters, Merchants, Ruin locations, Temple locations, and Victory & Defeat screens.

The artwork of the world of Telestians. Explore the fantasy world of Telestia, where many races live, prosper and war. See the heroes of the Barbarians, Chaos Horde, Dwarves, Elves, Gadiantons, Knights, Orcs, Reptilians and Undead. Complete with environmental art, and all the roaming monsters, Telestians is perfect to bring out your creativity and get lost in an fantastical world of intrigue.
legal_notice: Telestians, and the Telestians Logo are trademarks of Lucid LX LLC. Artwork & music are property of Lucid LX LLC. All rights reserved.
name: Telestians - Art Book
reviews:
“"...if you're in the mood for brandished swords, scantily-clad babes, and bloody-clawed monsters, then this is the book for you!"”
5/5 – Max Ingram
short_description: Explore 200+ uncensored artworks of the fantasy world of Telestia. View all the Heroes of the Barbarians, Chaos Horde, Dwarves, Elves, Gadiantons, Knights, Orcs, Reptilians and Undead. Enjoy all Monsters, Merchants, Ruin & Temple locations, and Victory & Defeat screens. Spark your creativity!
